thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Christina Aschwanden

author: Christina Aschwanden
title: Christina Aschwanden
text: i booked through you as i saw that winter tyers are included. when i got there i had to pay an extra 144.- sfr which isn't planned in my budget. As i complained at the counter i got told to go through rentalscars.com. if you have the sign up that winter tyers are included i shouldn't have to pay extra. will arrange something else nxt time
